org.academiadecodigo.macasdoze.simplegfx

Class SimpleGfxPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.academiadecodigo.macasdoze.simplegfx.SimpleGfxPosition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Position
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleGfxMovablePosition

    public abstract class SimpleGfxPosition
extends java.lang.Object
implements Position
    Defines the positon of one object using the SimpleGraphics library and draws it.

    Created by vi.KINGS David Neves, Fabio Santos, Helia Marcos and Mario Ponte on 23/05/16.
